languages.text: Среди бумаг вам удается найти планы обрушения. Арбитры знали, что взрыв туннелей похоронит колонию, но уничтожение преступников оказалось важнее жизней простых переселенцев. В документах также находится карта Простора Коронус с зашифрованными данными. Кажется, законникам был известен еще один схрон контрабандистов, но в другой системе.

Searching through the papers, you find the demolition plans. The Arbitrators knew that detonating the tunnels would bury the colony, but prioritised eliminating the criminals over preserving the lives of ordinary settlers. The documents also include a map of the Koronus Expanse containing encrypted data. It appears the Arbitrators were aware of another smugglers' cache, but in a different system.
languages.original_text: Среди бумаг вам удается найти планы обрушения. Арбитры знали, что взрыв туннелей похоронит колонию, но уничтожение преступников оказалось важнее жизней простых переселенцев. В документах также находится карта Простора Коронус с зашифрованными данными. Кажется, законникам был известен еще один схрон контрабандистов, но в другой системе.

The Arbitrators knew that detonating the tunnels would bury the colony, but prioritised eliminating the criminals over preserving the lives of ordinary settlers. The documents also include a map of the Koronus Expanse that contains encrypted data. It appears the lawmen had knowledge of another smugglers' cache, but in a different system.

Searching through the papers, you find the demolition plans. The Arbitrators knew that detonating the tunnels would bury the colony, but prioritised eliminating the criminals over preserving the lives of ordinary settlers. The documents also include a map of the Koronus Expanse containing encrypted data. It appears the Arbitrators were aware of another smugglers' cache, but in a different system.

languages.text: Unter den Papieren befindet sich auch ein Plan für die Zerstörung der Stadt. Die Arbitratoren wussten, dass eine Detonation in den Tunneln die Kolonie begraben würde. Es war ihnen wichtiger, die Verbrecher zu eliminieren, als die Leben der gewöhnlichen Siedler zu verschonen. Die Dokumente enthalten auch eine Karte der Koronus-Ausdehnung mit verschlüsselten Daten. Offenbar wussten die Arbitratoren noch von einem weiteren Schmugglerversteck in einem anderen System.
languages.original_text: Searching through the papers, you find the demolition plans. The Arbitrators knew that detonating the tunnels would bury the colony, but prioritised eliminating the criminals over preserving the lives of ordinary settlers. The documents also include a map of the Koronus Expanse containing encrypted data. It appears the Arbitrators were aware of another smugglers' cache, but in a different system.

traits.locale_text: Unter den Papieren befindet sich auch ein Plan für die Zerstörung der Stadt. Die Arbitratoren wussten, dass eine Detonation in den Tunneln die Kolonie begraben würde. Es war ihnen wichtiger, die Verbrecher zu eliminieren, als die Leben der gewöhnlichen Siedler zu verschonen. Die Dokumente enthalten auch eine Karte der Koronus-Ausdehnung mit verschlüsselten Daten. Offenbar wussten die Arbitratoren noch von einem weiteren Schmugglerversteck in einem anderen System.

languages.text: En fouillant dans les papiers, vous finissez par mettre la main sur les plans de démolition. Les arbitrators savaient que la destruction des tunnels causerait la perte de la colonie, mais ont donné la priorité à l'élimination des ennemis plutôt qu'aux vies des habitants. Parmi les documents se trouve une carte des Étendues de Koronus contenant des données cryptées. Apparemment, les arbitrators avaient découvert une autre cache des contrebandiers, mais dans un système différent.
languages.original_text: Searching through the papers, you find the demolition plans. The Arbitrators knew that detonating the tunnels would bury the colony, but prioritised eliminating the criminals over preserving the lives of ordinary settlers. The documents also include a map of the Koronus Expanse containing encrypted data. It appears the Arbitrators were aware of another smugglers' cache, but in a different system.

traits.locale_text: En fouillant dans les papiers, vous finissez par mettre la main sur les plans de démolition. Les arbitrators savaient que la destruction des tunnels causerait la perte de la colonie, mais ont donné la priorité à l'élimination des ennemis plutôt qu'aux vies des habitants. Parmi les documents se trouve une carte des Étendues de Koronus contenant des données cryptées. Apparemment, les arbitrators avaient découvert une autre cache des contrebandiers, mais dans un système différent.

languages.text: 書類を調べたら、爆破解体の計画書を見つけた。アービトレイターたちは、トンネルを爆破すればコロニーが埋没することを承知していたが、一般住民の命よりも犯罪者の排除を優先した。その書類には、暗号化されたデータが記された、コロヌス・エクスパンスのマップも含まれている。どうやらアービトレイターたちは、別の星系にある密輸業者の隠し場所も把握していたようだ。
languages.original_text: Searching through the papers, you find the demolition plans. The Arbitrators knew that detonating the tunnels would bury the colony, but prioritised eliminating the criminals over preserving the lives of ordinary settlers. The documents also include a map of the Koronus Expanse containing encrypted data. It appears the Arbitrators were aware of another smugglers' cache, but in a different system.

traits.locale_text: 書類を調べたら、爆破解体の計画書を見つけた。アービトレイターたちは、トンネルを爆破すればコロニーが埋没することを承知していたが、一般住民の命よりも犯罪者の排除を優先した。その書類には、暗号化されたデータが記された、コロヌス・エクスパンスのマップも含まれている。どうやらアービトレイターたちは、別の星系にある密輸業者の隠し場所も把握していたようだ。

languages.text: Registrando los papeles, encuentras los planes de demolición. Los Arbitrator sabían que detonar los túneles sepultaría la colonia, pero dieron prioridad a eliminar a los criminales por encima de las vidas de los colonos normales. Los documentos también incluyen un mapa de la Extensión de Koronus que contiene datos encriptados. Al parecer, los Arbitrator habían descubierto otro alijo de contrabandistas en un sistema diferente.
languages.original_text: Searching through the papers, you find the demolition plans. The Arbitrators knew that detonating the tunnels would bury the colony, but prioritised eliminating the criminals over preserving the lives of ordinary settlers. The documents also include a map of the Koronus Expanse containing encrypted data. It appears the Arbitrators were aware of another smugglers' cache, but in a different system.

traits.locale_text: Registrando los papeles, encuentras los planes de demolición. Los Arbitrator sabían que detonar los túneles sepultaría la colonia, pero dieron prioridad a eliminar a los criminales por encima de las vidas de los colonos normales. Los documentos también incluyen un mapa de la Extensión de Koronus que contiene datos encriptados. Al parecer, los Arbitrator habían descubierto otro alijo de contrabandistas en un sistema diferente.

languages.text: 你浏览着文件，了解到了这场爆炸的真相。原来，那些法务官很清楚引爆隧道会摧毁整个殖民地，但他们依然认为打击罪犯比保护普通民众更加重要。此外，文件里还包含着一份科罗努斯扩区星图，其中隐藏着加密数据。看起来，那些法务官发现了另外一处走私集团窝点，但这个窝点位于另一个星系。
languages.original_text: Searching through the papers, you find the demolition plans. The Arbitrators knew that detonating the tunnels would bury the colony, but prioritised eliminating the criminals over preserving the lives of ordinary settlers. The documents also include a map of the Koronus Expanse containing encrypted data. It appears the Arbitrators were aware of another smugglers' cache, but in a different system.

traits.locale_text: 你浏览着文件，了解到了这场爆炸的真相。原来，那些法务官很清楚引爆隧道会摧毁整个殖民地，但他们依然认为打击罪犯比保护普通民众更加重要。此外，文件里还包含着一份科罗努斯扩区星图，其中隐藏着加密数据。看起来，那些法务官发现了另外一处走私集团窝点，但这个窝点位于另一个星系。

languages.text: Evrakları karıştırırken yıkım planlarını buluyorsun. Yargıcılar, tünelleri patlatmanın koloniyi de beraberinde çökerteceğinin farkındalarmış ancak belli ki sıradan halkın yaşam hakkını gözetmektense suçluları ortadan kaldırmayı önceliklendirmişler. Kayıtlarda ayrıca Koronus Enginliği'nin şifrelenmiş veriler içeren bir haritasını da buluyorsun. Anlaşılan Yargıcılar, farklı sistemdeki bir kaçakçı zulasının peşindeymiş.
languages.original_text: Searching through the papers, you find the demolition plans. The Arbitrators knew that detonating the tunnels would bury the colony, but prioritised eliminating the criminals over preserving the lives of ordinary settlers. The documents also include a map of the Koronus Expanse containing encrypted data. It appears the Arbitrators were aware of another smugglers' cache, but in a different system.

traits.locale_text: Evrakları karıştırırken yıkım planlarını buluyorsun. Yargıcılar, tünelleri patlatmanın koloniyi de beraberinde çökerteceğinin farkındalarmış, ancak belli ki sıradan halkın yaşam hakkını gözetmektense suçluları ortadan kaldırmayı önceliklendirmişler. Kayıtlarda ayrıca Koronus Enginliği'nin şifrelenmiş veriler içeren bir haritasını da buluyorsun. Anlaşılan Yargıcılar, farklı sistemdeki bir kaçakçı zulasının peşindelermiş.
